What are the hospital timings?: Our hospital operates from 7 AM to 6 PM daily.
How can I book an appointment?: You can book an appointment from the Appointment section after logging in.
How do I download my lab report?: Go to the Lab Reports section and click download next to your report.
How can I reset my password?: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.
What documents should I bring?: Please bring your ID, previous medical records, and insurance documents if available.
How long does a report take?: Lab reports are usually available within 24 hours of testing.
